Make a booking

CHILDREN'S BIRTHDAY PARTIES

BOOK WITH US

Seeing our children celebrating their birthdays with friends and family is priceless, and family time is indeed precious. Celebrations are the glue that holds the family together, and it’s an ideal time to make cherished memories. 

We provide a private space and party table for you to decorate for your little one’s big day. For the celebration, we include entrance to the Pixie and Fairy Village, hotdogs, cooldrinks, a toy/gift for the birthday girl/boy. The only outdoor wind-free location on the West Coast

Enquire at +27 73 302 5835 for pricing, which is available on request. 

FUN IN THE PIXIE GARDEN

The Pixie and Fairy Village is a magical venue for children's birthday parties.

This delightful venue offers a unique opportunity to have an unrivalled birthday experience. Set up your party amongst the trees where tables and chairs are already provided, layout a lush picnic on the lawn, or throw a sausage sizzle on the fire. Braai and picnic areas are dotted around the lush gardens and are open for day visitors to use.

The highlight of the birthday festivities is to visit The Pixie and Fairy Village, where you may meet Mama Pixie, who will tell a story or two about the pixies in the village. Mama Pixie is the creator and visionary of this unique tourist attraction which has impressed adults and children alike.

CHILDREN LOVE TO DRESS UP

and this is the perfect occasion!

Dress up parties are popular, and princesses, fairies, pixies and pirates are welcome to enjoy their festivities outdoors and in a safe, natural environment.

There is plenty of space to play, climb the jungle Jim or engage in traditional party games. This fun environment will satisfy even the most discerning princess!

The best part about having your upcoming children’s party at a venue is that you can just pick up the kids and go home. No mess, no fuss!

Booking Enquiries

Phone: +27 73 302 5835
Email: manager@jacobsbaybackpackers.co.za
ADDRESS: Plot 307, Jacobs Bay, 7380
Copyright © 2025 Jacobs bay accommodations

Quick Contact

ADDRESS: Plot 307, Jacobs Bay, 7380

PHONE: +27 73 302 5835
